item.title: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93
item.description: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93 junction. Turn left for I-11/US-93 (Exit 2); continue straight for Bus. US-93

item.title: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93
item.description: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93. Continue straight for Bus. US-93 to Lake Mead and Boulder City. Turn left for I-11/US-93 for Las Vegas and Kingman (Arizona).

item.title: US-95 North at I-11/US-93/NV-173
item.description: US-95 North at I-11/US-93/US-95 North/Henderson/Las Vegas. Continue north for NV-173 to Bus. US-93/Boulder City.

item.title: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173 to US-95 South
item.description: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173 to US-95 South in Boulder City. Turn left for access to US-95. This is the former intersection of US-93 and US-95, before being re-routed with the construction of I-11.

item.title: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173
item.description: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173 in Boulder City. Use exit for TO US-95 South/Searchlight. This was the former intersection of US-93 and US-95, which was moved south a short distance with the construction of I-11. A short connector highway, NV-173, connects this intersection with US-95 at I-11.

item.title: Bus. US-93 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on Bus. US-93 north in Boulder City. Distance to US-95 South and Railroad Pass Casino Road

item.title: I-11 North - Exit 2 Offramp
item.description: I-11 north at Exit 2 offramp. Merge left for NV-172 to Hoover Dam. Merge right for Bus. US-93 North to Boulder City and Lake Mead.

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 2
item.description: I-11 south at Exit 2 - US-93 Business/Boulder City. Access to Hoover Dam. This is the last exit on I-11 southbound in Nevada.

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 2
item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 2 - Bus. US-93/Boulder City

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 15B
item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 15B - Bus. US-93/Boulder City Parkway. I-11/US-93/US-95 continues south towards Kingman (Arizona).

item.title: US-93 South Boulder City Truck Route
item.description: Hoover Dam via Boulder City Center or US-93 Truck Route on US-93 south

item.title: US-95 North at US-93
item.description: US-95 north at US-93 South to Boulder City, US-93/US-95 North to Las Vegas

item.title: US-95 North at US-93
item.description: US-95/US-93 North/Henderson/Las Vegas on US-95 north

item.title: US-95 North at US-93 Jct.
item.description: US-95/US-93 north shields at onramp to Las Vegas.

item.title: US-95/US-93 South at US-95 South
item.description: US-93/US-95 south at US-95 south to Searchlight and Needles
